mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board order by bno desc
